com.rolemodelsoft.drawlet.awt
Class BufferedDrawingCanvasComponent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Canvas
              |
              +--com.rolemodelsoft.drawlet.awt.DrawingCanvasComponent
                    |
                    +--com.rolemodelsoft.drawlet.awt.BufferedDrawingCanvasComponent
public class BufferedDrawingCanvasComponent
extends DrawingCanvasComponent
implements java.awt.event.ComponentListener

This is just a DrawingCanvasComponent that uses double buffering for smooth drawing. This would probably be the typical approach if users are doing anything update-intensive.

See Also:
Serialized Form
